Verses: 1 yosiyaavin Kumaaranum Yoodhaavin Raajaavumaagiya Yoyaakkeemudaiya Raajyabaaraththin Thuvakkaththile Karththaraal Eremiyaavukku, Undaana Vaarththai:
2 karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Unakkuk Kayirugalaiyum Nugangalaiyum Undupanni, Avaigalai Un Kazhuththile Poottikkondu,

3 avaigalai Erusalemukku Sidhekkiyaa Raajaavinidaththil Varum Sthaanaapadhigal Kaiyile Edhomin Raajaavukkum, Movaabin Raajaavukkum, Ammon Puththirarin Raajaavukkum, Theeruvin Raajaavukkum, Seedhonin Raajaavukkum Anuppi,
4 avargal Thangal Ejamaangalukku Sollumpadik Karpikkavendumendru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal,
5 naan Boomiyaiyum Manushanaiyum Boomiyinmelulla Mirugajeevangalaiyum En Magaa Balaththinaalum Ongiya En Buyaththinaalum Undaakkinen; Enakku Ishtamaanavanukku Adhaik Kodukkiren.

6 ippozhudhum Naan Indha Dhesangalaiyellaam En Oozhiyakkaaranaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Engira Baabilon Raajaavin Kaiyile Koduththen; Avanukku Oozhiyancheyyumpadi Veliyin Mirugajeevangalaiyum Koduththen.

7 avanudaiya Dhesaththukkuk Kaalam Varugiravaraiyil Sagala Jaadhigalum Avanaiyum Avanudaiya Puththirapowththiraraiyum Sevippaargal; Adhinpinbu Anegam Jaadhigalum Periya Raajaakkalum Avanai Adimaikolvaargal.

8 endha Jaadhiyaavadhu, Endha Raajyamaavadhu Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Enbavanai Seviyaamalum, Than Kazhuththai Baabilon Raajaavin Nugaththukkuk Keezhppaduththaamalumponaal, Andha Jaadhiyai Naan Avan Kaiyaale Nirmoolamaakkumalavum, Pattayaththaalum Panjaththaalum Kollainoyaalum Dhandippen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

9 baabilon Raajaavai Neengal Sevippadhillaiyendru Ungalukku Sollugira Ungal Theerkkadharisigalukkum, Ungal Kurikaararukkum, Ungal Soppanakkaararukkum, Ungal Naalpaarkkiravargalukkum, Ungal Sooniyakkaararukkum Neengal Sevikodaadhirungal.
10 naan Ungalai Ungal Dhesaththilirundhu Dhoorappaduththugiradharkum, Ungalaith Thuraththividugiradharkum, Neengal Azhigiradharkumaaga Avargal Ungalukkup Poiyaana Theerkkadharisanam Sollugiraargal.

11 aanaalum Endha Jaadhi Than Kazhuththai Baabilon Raajaavin Nugaththukkuk Keezhppaduththi, Avanai Sevikkumo, Andha Jaadhiyaith Than Dhesaththaip Payirittu, Adhile Kudiyirundhu Thaabarikkappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

12 indha Ellaa Vaarththaigalinpadiye Naan Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaavodu Pesi: Ungal Kazhuththai Baabilon Raajaavin Nugaththukkuk Keezhppaduththi, Avanaiyum Avan Janaththaiyum Seviyungal, Appozhudhu Pizhaippeergal.
13 baabilon Raajaavai Seviyaamarpogira Jaadhikku Virodhamaaga Karththar Sonnadhinpadiye, Neeyum Un Janamum Pattayaththaalum Panjaththaalum Kollainoyaalum Saavaanen?
14 neengal Baabilon Raajaavai Sevippadhillaiyendru Ungaludane Sollugira Theerkkadharisigalin Vaarththaigalaik Kelaadhirungal; Avargal Ungalukkup Poiyaana Theerkkadharisanam Sollugiraargal.

15 naan Avargalai Anuppinadhillai; Naan Ungalaith Thuraththividugiradharkum, Neengalum Ungalukkuth Theerkkadharisanam Sollugira Theerkkadharisigalum Azhindhupogiradharkum Allavo Ivargal En Naamaththai Solli, Poiyaana Theerkkadharisanam Uraikkiraargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endren.

16 melum Naan Aasaariyaraiyum Indha Ellaa Janangalaiyum Nokki: Idho, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Panimuttugal Ippozhudhu Seekkiraththile Baabilonilirundhu Thirumbikkonduvarappadumendru, Ungalukkuth Theerkkadharisanam Sollugira Ungaludaiya Theerkkadharisigalin Vaarththaigalaik Kelaadhirungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Avargal Ungalukkup Poiyaana Theerkkadharisanam Sollugiraargal.
17 avargalukku Sevikodaadhirungal; Baabilon Raajaavai Seviyungal, Appozhudhu Pizhaippeergal Indha Nagaram Paazhaaippogavendiyadhenna?

18 alladhu Avargal Theerkkadharisigalaayirundhu, Avargalidaththile Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Irundhaal, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththilum, Yoodhaa Raajaavin Aramanaiyilum, Erusalemilum Meedhiyaana Panimuttugal Baabilonukkup Pogaadhapadikku Avargal Senaigalin Karththarai Nokki Mandraadattume.

19 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Yoyaakkeemin Kumaaranaagiya Ekoniyaa Ennum Yoodhaavin Raajaavaiyum, Yoodhaavilum Erusalemilirundha Periyor Anaivaraiyum Erusalemilirundhu Baabilonukku Siraipidiththukkondupogaiyil,
20 edukkaamal Vitta Sagala Thoongalaiyum Kadalthottiyaiyum, Aadhaarangalaiyum, Indha Nagaraththil Meedhiyaana Matrap Panimuttugalaiyunkuriththu Senaigalinkarththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal,

21 karththarudaiya Aalayaththilum, Yoodhaaraajaavin Aramanaiyilum, Erusalemilum Meedhiyaana Andhap Panimuttugal Baabilonukkuk Kondupogappadumendru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
22 naan Avaigalai Visaarikkum Naalvaraikkum Avaigal Ange Irukkum; Pinbu Avaigalaith Thirumba Indha Sthalaththirkuk Konduvarappannuven Endrukarththar Sollugiraar Endren.
